review: I originally ordered an amazon fire modem that did not work properly out of the box. Amazon is not set up to call for assistance so I returned the item and ordered a Firestick. review: I absolutley love the Fire TV Stick. it's so simple to install and start using right away that anyone can do it.  I have been using it for a week now and I enjoy the ease of watching my movies on the TV instead of my laptop. I have quite a few on my "Watch List" that i'm planning to watch with my granddaughters. The selection on the Amazon library it's great. I have not use the other options on the Fire Stick like streaming my pictures and home videos yet.

review: I have both the Fire TV Stick and the Fire TV.  I got both the week they came out and actually enjoy using them both.I can say the Fire TV stick for me has been just as good as the Fire TV for streaming both TV ( I don't play games on these devices)The ONLY thing I like about the Fire TV vs. the Fire TV stick is that the Fire TV has an Ethernet port.  I have good wifi coverage in my home but I always prefer wired when possible.
